institution.name: Pimpri Chinchwad College of Engineering (PCCoE)
institution.description: PCCoE is one of the best engineering colleges in Pune, offering a professional environment for academics, industry-oriented training, co-curricular activities, and excellent placements. It is affiliated with Savitribai Phule Pune University (SPPU).
why_choose: Participation and achievement in state and national level competitions

city_highlights.name: Pimpri Chinchwad
features: Industrial hub known as Detroit of the East
Presence of national and multinational automobile, manufacturing, and IT companies
Access to top professional, educational, medical, and recreational facilities
Less pollution and population congestion compared to urban centers

campuses.surroundings: Industrial and IT hubs / Special Economic Zone

applicants: Children of Indian Workers in Gulf Countries
requirements: HSC or equivalent with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects, and one of Chemistry/Biotechnology/Biology/Technical/Vocational subjects
Subject to rules and regulations of DTE/ARA/Govt. of Maharashtra

foreign_nationals: Affidavit of candidate/parent with full identity details
Proof of residence (Driving License or Telephone Bill)
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing SSC or Equivalent
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing HSC or Equivalent
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing Qualifying or Equivalent Exam
PIO: Affidavit of candidate/parent with full identity details
Proof of residence (Driving License, Telephone Bill, Property Tax, IT return)
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing SSC or Equivalent
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing HSC or Equivalent
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing Qualifying or Equivalent Exam
CIWGC: CIWGC Certificate of Candidate or Parent
Affidavit of candidate/parent with full identity details
Passport and Nationality Certificate of Parent
Residence and Valid VISA of Parent in Gulf
Work Permit or Letter from Employer
Proof of residence (Driving License, Telephone Bill, Property Tax, IT return)
Proof of minimum 182 days of Parent stay in Gulf for the academic year prior to admission
Gulf bank account passbook with entries for last 6 months
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing SSC or Equivalent
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing HSC or Equivalent
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing Qualifying or Equivalent Exam
NRI: NRI Certificate of Candidate or of a close relative with affidavit and documentary evidence
Affidavit of candidate/sponsor with full identity details
Passport and Nationality Certificate of Sponsor
Residence and Valid VISA of Sponsor
Proof of residence (Driving License, Telephone Bill, Property Tax, IT return)
Proof of minimum 182 days of sponsor stay abroad for the academic year prior to admission
Foreign bank account passbook with entries for last 6 months
Affidavit of family chart signed by sponsor
Supporting documents for family chart (Leaving certificates, Birth extracts, Mark sheets, PAN Card, Passport, Marriage Certificate)
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing SSC or Equivalent
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing HSC or Equivalent
Statement of Marks/Certificate of Passing Qualifying or Equivalent Exam
